name: Cyber Risk Management, Stockholm
content: Sessions will cover key cyber risk considerations including where cyber risk fits into overall risk strategy and interacts with It, how to create a design, implement and manage a cyber risk program, approaches to modelling, vendor risk management and cyber resilience. Day one of the course will provide an in-depth look into governance and how cyber risk fits into risk management. The integration of cyber risk and IT will then be considered before looking at best practice approaches to designing, implementing and managing a cyber risk programme. The day will end with approaches to modelling cyber risk. Day two continues with over overviews of new technological innovations and how these are impacting financial firms before moving onto to cover third party vendor risk and how to continually manage the risk profile. Human behaviour as a source of cyber risk will also be covered before the training concludes with how to create and manage cyber resilience and business continuity planning within your organisation.
